channel.title: Pickup Command problems

item.title: Pickup Command problems
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 2)) {
				try {
					int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12));
					int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));
					if (/*newItemID <= 20000 && */newItemID >= 0) {
						addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
					} else {
						sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist");
					}
				} catch(Exception e) {
					sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! ");
				}
			}

Try that. I added an ‘else’ before the if statement.

item.description:

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 2)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13)); if (/*newItemID <= 20000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! "); } } [br][size=1]Posted on: November 20, 2007, 05:20:37 PM[/size][hr]Is there part of the command im missing??
